channel.title: Fruit – Cloud Chemistry
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Orderâ„¢

item.title: Potion
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A tropical blend featuring pineapple and kiwi, with a berry finish.
item.content:encoded: Potion is a sweet, tropical blend that will inject sun and fun into any day. Pineapple and kiwi wed together for a happy marriage of sweet and tangy. Gentle tones of berry are then added to compliment the kiwi; and floral honeysuckle comes in to help maintain and round out the blend for that satisyfing exhale.

item.title: Titan
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A pear and citrus blend to enliven the senses.
item.content:encoded: This blend is a worthy embodiment of its namesake. On the inhale, you’ll encounter pronounced notes of sweet tangerine and mango. While on the exhale, the citrus notes are tamed by the tender presence of ripe, juicy pear.

item.title: Elixir
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A sophisticated melding of berries and citrus.
item.content:encoded: Elixir is the miracle fruit tincture of the gods. This blend presents a captivating mixture of ripe and juicy strawberries, lemon, lime, and exotic acai berry. This eLiquid blend may not be a “superfood”, but it sure tastes like it.

item.title: Fortran
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A melon punch with a swift kick of dragonfruit at the end.
item.content:encoded: This fearless tropical fruit punch forms with a base of watermelon, dragonfruit, and fresh pineapple. Then, for some artistic acidity, and to refine the sweetness, we add a twist of pink lemonade. This is one punch you won’t mind taking to the face.

item.title: Seneca
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A remarkable melon parfait with a cucumber twist.
item.content:encoded: Choice honeydew, refreshing cantaloupe, and crispy cucumber come together to form this palate pleasing potion. To sharpen the mild characteristics of the cucumber and cantaloupe, we add a creamy vanilla custard and a dollop of vanilla bean infused whipped cream. This blend is a virtuos delight befitting of the most sophisticated palates.

item.title: Plasma
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A blend of citrus fruits and crisp green apples.
item.content:encoded: Crisp green apples mix with a symphony of guava, mango, and fresh Hawaiian pineapple to present a fruit orchestration that is downright mesmerizing. The tart green apples help to cut the tang of the citrus, as well as the overall sweetness of the blend. A touch of guava comes in at the end to round everything out with a nice flourish.

item.title: Prime
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A noteworthy blend of cactus and mixed berries with a citrus finish.
item.content:encoded: One of our more distinguished experiences, Prime is a mixture that frontlines cactus and sweet, aromatic currants, with a twist of lemon lime. This alluring blend will have everyone around you wondering who the mysteriously interesting person is.

item.title: Polaris
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A gratifying blend of melon and cream with quiet citrus notes.
item.content:encoded: A delicate and delectable melon parfait with subtle notes of mango and honeysuckle. Polaris starts with a sweet, tangy vanilla custard, which is then topped with savory, toasted slivers of walnut and coconut. This blend has consistently impressed both fruit and dessert connoisseurs.

item.title: Degree
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A sweet and tangy mango margarita.
item.content:encoded: Our proprietary twist on the classic margarita, Degree kicks things up a notch (or two). First, we add lush mango to the mix. Then, to complete the creation, just a squeeze of lemon lime, and a touch of cool, refreshing menthol. Degree is a blend sure to satisfy morning, noon, or nightcap.

item.title: Helium
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: A robust sweet citrus blend with influential lemon overtones.
item.content:encoded: Originally created to be our in-house palate cleanser, Helium is effective at reawakening even the most flavor fatigued. A combination of tart, crisp ruby-red grapefruit, juicy sweet lemons, and tangy blood orange, this is one house blend that we are happy to share.
